foragersgamble:poison.warn.lt1: A sharp pain strikes your stomach from eating {0}.
foragersgamble:poison.warn.1to5: An unbearable pain wracks your system from eating a {0}.
foragersgamble:poison.warn.5to10: Toxins from eating a {0} wreak havoc on your system.
foragersgamble:poison.warn.10to14: A searing wave of nausea surges through you from consuming a {0}.
foragersgamble:poison.warn.15to49: Your vision tunnels—lethal {0} poison overtakes you.
foragersgamble:poison.warn.50plus: Your body seizes as the fatal poison in the {0} overwhelms you.
foragersgamble:poison.warn.lt1.plain: A sharp pain strikes your stomach.
foragersgamble:poison.warn.1to5.plain: An unbearable pain wracks your system.
foragersgamble:poison.warn.5to10.plain: Toxins wreak havoc on your system.
foragersgamble:poison.warn.10to14.plain: A searing wave of nausea surges through you.
foragersgamble:poison.warn.15to49.plain: Your vision tunnels as the poison overtakes you.
foragersgamble:poison.warn.50plus.plain: Your body seizes—the poison is overwhelming.
foragersgamble:poison.warn.instant: Your veins burn as a surge of poison floods your body at once.
